arm_group.description: patients converted from Prograf® to Advagraf® in the first 3 months after transplantation
patients converted from Prograf® to Advagraf® between 3 months and one year after transplantation

brief_summary.textblock:
A study in which two groups of patients will be analysed; patients converted from Prograf to
      Advagraf within the first 3 months after transplantation and patients converted from Prograf
      to Advagraf between 3 months and 1 year after transplantation.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multicenter Study in Liver Transplant Patients Converted From Prograf® to Advagraf® During the First Post-transplantation Year

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient with a liver transplant performed in the previous year and for whom the
             conversion from Prograf® to Advagraf® was decided by the physician.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient participating in an interventional clinical trial at the time of enrolment
             into the study.

clinical_study.official_title: A Cohort Study in Liver Transplant Patients Converted From a Tacrolimus Twice a Day (Prograf®) to Tacrolimus Once a Day (Advagraf®). French, Multisite, Observational Study

overall_official.last_name: Medical and Scientific Affairs Manager, Transplantation

oversight_info.authority: France: Comité consultatif sur le traitement de l'information en matière de recherche dans le domaine de la santé

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with a conversion ratio of tacrolimus dose of 1mg/1mg and percentage of patients with a ratio differing from 1mg/1mg
primary_outcome.measure: Conversion ratio of the daily dose of tacrolimus (mg Prograf® / mg Advagraf®)

primary_outcome.description: Number of days between the conversion date and the date of the first determination of C0 after conversion
primary_outcome.measure: Time of the first tacrolimus trough level (C0) after conversion
primary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to first determination of C0 (up to 6 months)

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with additional visit(s) and percentage of patients without an additional visit
primary_outcome.measure: Number of additional visits considered by the physicians to be due to the conversion (if required)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At 6 months and at 1 year follow-up visit

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Number of pills, number of treatment intake, treatment compliance, physician request, patient request, safety of treatment, center practice

Sociodemographic data, history of transplantation, comorbidities, complications after transplantation, risk factors, concomitant treatments (other than immunosuppressive protocols) and modification, if required, at 6 months and 1 year after conversion

Date of initiation of treatment with Advagraf®
Target tacrolimus C0 (with Prograf® and with Advagraf® and recommendations for administration)
Daily dose of Advagraf®
Adjustments to Advagraf® dose since the previous visit: date, doses and reason for adjustment
Type and dose of immunosuppressive drugs combined with Advagraf®
Modification of the immunosuppressive regimen at 6 months and 1 year after conversion (if applicable) since the previous visit: date, modified treatment, type of modification, reason for modification
Immunosuppressive regimen at the end of the visit at 6 months and 1 year after conversion, modified treatment, type of modification, reason for modification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, 6 months and 1 year follow-up visit
From baseline to first determination of C0 (up to 6 months)

secondary_outcome.description: Ratio of daily dose of tacrolimus during achievement of steady state: mg Prograf® at conversion/mg Advagraf® during achievement of steady state. Percentage of patients with a ratio of 1mg/1mg and percentage of patients with a ratio differing from 1mg/1mg
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline and up to 6 months post-conversion

secondary_outcome.measure: The Intra -Patient Variability (IPV) of tacrolimus in patients on Prograf® and Advagraf ®
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (Prograf) and during the 45 days after conversion (Advagraf)

secondary_outcome.description: Values and dates for renal parameters, liver parameters, blood glucose and Hepatitis C viral load
secondary_outcome.measure: Latest available laboratory data with Prograf® before conversion and with Advagraf®
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, 6 months and 1 year follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.description: Compliance with treatment at conversion (with Prograf® and only in group 2) and at 1 year after conversion (with Advagraf® for both groups) will be assessed using the Morisky questionnaire and a score will be calculated
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At  baseline and at 1 year after conversion

secondary_outcome.description: Patients' quality of life at conversion (with Prograf® only in group 2) and at 1 year after conversion (with Advagraf® for both groups) will be assessed using the European Quality of Life-5 Dimensions 5 level (EQ5D-5L) questionnaire
secondary_outcome.measure: Patients' quality of life at conversion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At  baseline and at 1 year after conversion

secondary_outcome.description: Will be assessed on the basis of the number of acute rejections confirmed by biopsy and recorded adverse events and adverse reactions
secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of acute rejection proven by biopsy (BPAR), graft survival rate and patient survival rate
Occurrence of adverse events and/or effects
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline until 1 year follow-up visit

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
